020101.name: Shardstone
020101.description: Shardstone is a useful manufacturing and construction material. It can be found in abundance across, and interspersed throughout, the planet Sirus.

020201.name: Murky Water
020201.description: Unfiltered, and dirty, water that is in abundance on Sirus. Whilst not safe to drink in its natural state, it can be deposited into a Portable Purifier to make safe for drinking.

020301.name: Wood
020301.description: A small collection of wood, found in large quantities across the planet, that is used in various manufacturing and construction efforts.

020401.name: Biomass
020401.description: A mixture of various biological debris (i.e. wood shavings, wilting plant life, wasting fauna, etc), in a state of advanced decay. When in this state the resulting Biomass produces natural gas emissions that have manufacturing and power generation benefits.

020501.name: Raw Meat
020501.description: Usually obtained as a result of hunting or trapping wild animals, Raw Meat can be used as bait to summon Companions OR depositing it into a Compact Grill to restore HP.

020601.name: Raw Fish
020601.description: Obtained via the simple act of fishing, Raw Fish can be used as bait to summon Companions OR depositing it into a Compact Grill to restore HP.

030101.name: Survival Axe
030101.usage: When equipped, the Survival Axe can be used against wild animals and other players. (Swinging Attack = 5 Damage)

030102.name: Service Handgun
030102.usage: When equipped, the Service Handgun can be used against wild animals and other players. (Single Shot = 11 Damage)

030103.name: Assault Rifle
030103.usage: When equipped, the Assault Rifle can be used against wild animals and other players. (Burst Fire = 17 Damage)

030201.name: Expedition Pack
030201.usage: When equipped, store up to four (4) Resources OR two (2) Utilities for later use. Stored items should be placed on top of this card.

030202.name: Portable Purifier
030202.usage: When equipped, deposit Murky Water into the purifier to replenish some HP. (x1 Murky Water = +15 HP)

030203.name: Compact Grill
030203.usage: When equipped, deposit Raw Meat or Raw Fish into the grill to replenish significant HP. (x1 Raw Meat OR x1 Raw Fish = +30 HP)

030204.name: Handheld Torch
030204.usage: When equipped, in a cavernous area, encounter roll chances are cut in half. But no card draws. (1-3 = No Encounter, 4-6 = Encounter)

040101.name: Prefab Warehouse
040101.usage: Allows for the storage of up to eight (8) Resources or four (4) Equipment. Must visit the structure to deposit items, but can withdraw from anywhere.

040201.name: Prefab Habitat
040201.usage: At the end of your turn, your character OR a summoned Companion can replenish 20 HP. (30 HP / 15 DEF)

040301.name: Drone Hub

attacks.name: Defensive Attack
attacks.description: Automated drones attack a selected hostile target within range.

040301.usage: Once per turn, deploy automated security drones to deal 15 Damage to a hostile target in range. (40 HP / 10 DEF)

040401.name: Armoury
040401.usage: When your character is on the Armoury tile, all Weapons can be equipped at no Equipping Cost. (35 HP / 20 DEF)

040402.name: Workshop
040402.usage: When your character is on the Workshop tile, all Utilities can be equipped at no Equipping Cost. (35 HP / 15 DEF)

050101.name: Trauma MedKit
050101.description: Use the Trauma MedKit to restore health. Costs 1 Biomass to use. (Usage limited to once per turn)

050102.name: Emergency MedKit
050102.description: Use the Emergency MedKit to restore health. Costs 2 Biomass to use. (Usage limited to once per turn)

050201.name: Settlement Rations
050201.description: Use the Settlement Rations to restore movement points. Costs 1 Biomass to use. (Usage limited to once per turn)

050301.name: Signal Jammer
050301.description: Use the Signal Jammer to disrupt enemy signals. Costs 1 Biomass to use. (Usage limited to once per turn)
